Publishing data on a channel is an asynchronous operation.

note.para: Calling publish() does not mean that you have published the message when publish() returns.

warning.para: The ClientSession API allows you also to batch using startBatch() and endBatch(), but remember to call endBatch() after having called startBatch(), for example in a finally block. If you don't, your messages will continue to queue up, and your application will not work as expected.
